nasha_dashboard_partition_accesses_descr: Add IP addresses or ranges authorised to access this partition. By default, no IP addresses or ranges are authorised. Currently, HA-NAS can only be used with OVHcloud IPs (Dedicated Servers/Virtual Private Servers/Public Cloud/So you Start/Kimsufi/ADSL).
nasha_dashboard_partition_accesses_ip_pl: IP or IP block for your services
